pair.usernameLabel: E-mail address - (Use a extra Eufy admin account - 2FA Disabled)
pair.reset:
Do not reset the notification service if you have working triggers (person detected etc).

Hitting this button wil create a new instance and might cause duplicate
pair.no_data: No devices found. Try a diferrent region.
pair.no_devices: No devices found. Make sure you shared the Eufy devices with your admin extra account
pair.keypad: The keypad is a physical device to set the security mode for the Homebase. Therefore this has no own functionality in the Homey app. To make flows based on or change security modes please add the homebase instead (if not already done so). There you can find the security modes and flow cards for security modes.
